Essentially CS is a greedy woman, but I love her all the time.

I used to play this game a lot (daily), now I only play 1 mm match every few days and somewhat casually. Why? Because my rank and skill decayed over time and now am stuck with versing 'silver' prime accounts that are fresh AND empty. It only happened after cs went free to play and pay to prime. Will never know if those people are smurfing or straight up cheating their arse off, maybe I can find fun again in non MM gamemodes but I will not recommend new players from trying to grind their way up in MM.
